tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE greenhouse_conditions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    light_intensity DECIMAL,
    soil_moisture DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE plant_data (
    plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species VARCHAR(255),
    growth_stage VARCHAR(50),
    last_watering_date DATE,
    water_consumption_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE GreenhouseSensorData (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  greenhouse_id INT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE GreenhouseSettings (
  setting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  greenhouse_id INT,
  temperature_threshold FLOAT,
  humidity_threshold FLOAT,
  automatic_watering BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE PlantInventory (
  plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_name VARCHAR(100),
  plant_type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  supplier_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Temperature (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Humidity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE LightIntensity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    light_intensity INT
)

CREATE TABLE WaterLevel (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    water_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Greenhouse (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    light_intensity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Plants (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_name VARCHAR,
    species VARCHAR,
    growth_stage VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Sensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR,
    sensor_type VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    light_intensity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reading_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR,
    message TEXT
)
